comments:
Version I20070501-0010

Run an evaluation that stops on a breakpoint.  Terminate the target, the following exception occurs.  It would be better to cancel the evaluation or give a more helpful error message.

Error
Tue May 01 10:05:39 CDT 2007
Exception processing async thread queue

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIVoidValue.<init>(JDIVoidValue.java:26)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIDebugTarget.voidValue(JDIDebugTarget.java:1762)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.engine.Interpreter.getResult(Interpreter.java:102)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.engine.ASTEvaluationEngine$EvalRunnable.run(ASTEvaluationEngine.java:523)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIThread$ThreadJob.run(JDIThread.java:2595)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 182158 ***
